summary: This document is an email or memo summarizing a call with Pat Pileggi regarding an investigation into a record from Mar-a-Lago. The conversation reveals that Janine Gill, a long-term employee, has no knowledge of who created the record or its source, and that it appears to have been created randomly, not regularly. Further inquiry into a potential predecessor is planned.

persons.name: Pat Pileggi
persons.context: Person who was called regarding an investigation into a Mar-a-Lago record; is trying to find more information about the record's origin.

persons.name: Janine Gill
persons.context: Has worked at Mar-a-Lago for about 9 years; stated she does not know who prepared the record in question, its source, and that it appears to have been created randomly.

connections.description: Pat Pileggi contacted or discussed Janine Gill in relation to an investigation about a Mar-a-Lago record.

events.title: Call with Pat Pileggi re: Mar a Lago record
events.description: A call was held to discuss an investigation into a specific record from Mar-a-Lago, where employee Janine Gill's lack of knowledge about the record was reported.

keyFacts: Janine Gill, a Mar-a-Lago employee of about 9 years, has no knowledge of who prepared a specific record, its source, and states it appears to have been created randomly, not on a regular basis.
Pat Pileggi is investigating the origin of a Mar-a-Lago record and plans to try to find a predecessor to Janine Gill who might have more information.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs, indicating it is part of a legal or investigative proceeding.
